org.gvsig.fmap.dal.coverage.store

Interface RasterDataServerExplorer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataServerExplorer, Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostGISRasterServerExplorer, WCSServerExplorer, WMSServerExplorer, WMTSServerExplorer

    public interface RasterDataServerExplorer
extends DataServerExplorer
    RasterDataServerExplorer is an abstraction for a raster server. It allows connecting to the server and browsing its contents. More specifically, this interface provides a list of the available data stores in a server.
